subject: Ratings (Audience Measurement)
Baseball
Television
lead_paragraph: Tickets for the Yankees’ first 13 home games were up nearly 10 percent from last year, and ratings on YES were up 38 percent. Mets’ ticket sales were up, too, but their TV ratings were down.
